title: A Picturesque residence w/in-unit W&D, open floorplan & walk to Trans!
posting_body: This quaint, garden residence in Pacific Heights boasts soaring ceilings and room to comfortably sleep, work and entertain - all in one place.
The generous floorplan, dual walk-in closets, in-unit laundry and ample storage gives this studio more flexible use of space than most one bedrooms.
The kitchen offers plenty of counter space and a pass-through breakfast bar makes for a nice flow into the great room.
The bathroom features a tiled shower over tub.
This home makes a great pied-a-tierre or city home and is well located moments to Polk and Union Street shops, restaurants, artisanal coffee, Lafayette Park, Whole Foods and so much more.
Half a block to MUNI, corporate shuttles, and all the North side has to offer!
A perfect retreat in the heart of it all!
